description:
Komi wonders why everyone starts staring at her when, like the rest of the student body, she switches from her winter to her summer school uniform.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just My Summer Uniform. / It`s Just a Fitness Test. / It`s Just Veggies. Garlic. Lots of Lard. Soy Sauce. / It`s Just a Blood Pact.
Natsufuku Desu. / Tairyoku Sokutei Desu. / Yasai Ninniku Abura Mashimashi Karame Desu. / Chi no Keiyaku Desu.
夏服です. / 体力測定です. / ヤサイニンニクアブラマシマシカラメです. / 血の契約です.
